name: Gnossienne demo
description:
Gnossienne - a game about a detective's insomnia. Citizens are discovered to be sick with insomnia. They call it an anomaly, because most of the citizens have begun to see strange things in their dreams, things they've never seen before. Investigate the detectives’ dreams, and try to not lose important omens.

In-game features:

  • Story telling based on visual narrative, with hidden deep sub-story.
  • A lot of puzzles and riddles.
  • Puzzle eco-system. Almost everything is connected to each other.

-RU game page-
